casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Richard Allen ROBERTS. No. D-3031. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 29, 2018.

Richard Allen Roberts, of White Plains, New York, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
